main event: Two possible aircraft were observed near Grissom AFB in Indiana for 5-10 minutes.
interesting points: The objects were described as bright white lights, some with amber lights, that appeared to have high intensity landing lights.
The objects made sharp turns and paused behind a farm silo before continuing to move rapidly in different directions.
Other witnesses, including the reporter's wife, also saw the objects but were reluctant to be interviewed.
The objects were estimated to be about the size of the full moon and made hardly any noise.
The reporter was an experienced pilot who had seen many unusual lights in the sky but could not explain the maneuvers and capabilities of these objects.
sighted object: two possible aircraft with bright white and amber lights
